üéß Larry Mantle, Joan Weinstein, Mika Yoshitake, Jessica Nieble, and Peter Sachs Collopy, Art and Science Collide at Southern California‚Äôs Third Annual PST ART Series, AirTalk, September 12, 2024.

Touted as the ‚Äúlargest cultural event in the United States‚Äù by organizers, the PST ART series (formerly known as Pacific Standard Time), returns for its third year in Southern California. This year‚Äôs theme Art & Science Collide celebrates the interrelationship of art and science with over 800 artists and more than 70 cultural institutions participating across Southern California. The series, which will take place from September 15, 2024 - February 16, 2025, looks to bring science to the public with conversations touching on the crossroads of climate change and social justice, the future of Indigenous knowledge and technology, and exploring the science behind the colors in some of your favorite films.
